text:
With pigtails bouncing, full of glee,
Esme jumped up, ready to see
A playground like no other place -
With rainbow slides and lots of space!

lines: With pigtails bouncing, full of glee,
Esme jumped up, ready to see
A playground like no other place -
With rainbow slides and lots of space!

simplified_text:
She can run up.
She has fun.
I see her go.
Big red slides.

text:
She danced and twirled along the way,
Where rainbow bubbles seemed to play,
Until she spied the biggest thing -
A castle where she'd play and swing!

lines: She danced and twirled along the way,
Where rainbow bubbles seemed to play,
Until she spied the biggest thing -
A castle where she'd play and swing!

simplified_text:
She runs and runs.
She sees the big.
Her fun is here.
Come and play.

text:
Her best friends waved and called her name,
All ready for their favorite game.
They climbed and crawled through tunnels bright,
And whooshed down slides with pure delight!

lines: Her best friends waved and called her name,
All ready for their favorite game.
They climbed and crawled through tunnels bright,
And whooshed down slides with pure delight!

simplified_text:
She sees her mom.
We can go up.
The dog runs up.
Fun in red.

text:
Through sparkly windows, pink and blue,
Past towers where the fairies flew,
She found a magic garden sweet
With flowers dancing at her feet.

lines: Through sparkly windows, pink and blue,
Past towers where the fairies flew,
She found a magic garden sweet
With flowers dancing at her feet.

simplified_text:
She sees it big.
She can go in.
Red and big fun.
Let me see.

text:
Under trees with leaves of gold,
She watched brave bunnies, soft and bold,
And built a house with twigs and flowers
Where tiny mice could spend their hours.

lines: Under trees with leaves of gold,
She watched brave bunnies, soft and bold,
And built a house with twigs and flowers
Where tiny mice could spend their hours.

simplified_text:
She sits and sees.
The cat runs up.
She has fun here.
Big red fun.

text:
As sunset painted purple skies,
Esme yawned and rubbed her eyes.
Her heart was full of happy fun -
The most amazing day was done!

lines: Esme yawned and rubbed her eyes.
Her heart was full of happy fun -
The most amazing day was done!

simplified_text:
The dad is here.
She can not run.
Up to mom now.
Fun is done.
